text: Aruer a Ikiavɨra Itir God baghavɨra ikiasa akam akɨrizibar dɨbobonim, a bar ua dar amuam. Dar dɨbobonim, aruer kamɨn ikegh mangɨva, aruer kabar dɨbobonim gɨvagham. A uan akar dɨkɨrɨzimɨn gɨn zuir aruer faragha ghueziba, da pura ghue. Guizbangɨra, an dapanarɨzim nan damazimɨn mɨze. Kamaghɨn, an azenir vamɨra itir sipsipɨn apurir igiatam inigh osɨmtɨziba agɨvamin ofan mɨn na bagh izɨ.
